i1.name: Blade's End
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Talon's''' damaging [[champion ability|abilities]] apply a ''wound'' [[stack]] for 6 seconds to enemy {{tip|champions}} and large {{tip|monsters}} hit, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on [[basic attack]]s [[on-hit]] and subsequent damaging abilities.

'''Talon's''' next basic attack against a target with 3 ''wound'' stacks will consume the stacks to cause the target to bleed, dealing them {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|75 to 245}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} over 2 seconds, with each tick occurring every {{fd|0.125}} seconds. The '''total''' damage is increased by 20% against monsters.
i1.notes:
* {{Pending for test}}: Interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only prevent stacks from being applied.

q1.name: Noxian Diplomacy
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' {{tip|dashes}} towards the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} on arrival. Casting the ability within 170 units of the target causes '''Talon''' to instead stab them and {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|50|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
If ''Noxian Diplomacy'' kills the target, '''Talon''' {{tip|heals}} for {{passive progression/deprecated version|10 to 70}} and 50% of its {{sti|cooldown}} is refunded.
The stab version of ''Noxian Diplomacy'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Talon's''' basic attack timer and increases the {{sti|range}} of his next basic attack within 1 second by 75.
''Noxian Diplomacy will cause '''Talon''' to automatically basic attack the target.''
leveling: {{st|Dash Physical Damage|{{ap|65 to 165}} {{as|(+ 110% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Stab Physical Damage|{{ap|65*1.5 to 165*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110*1.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, only the melee version of the ability can be used.
* '''Talon''' will stop at the target's last location if they {{tip|blink}} long distances (i.e {{si|Recall}}, {{si|Teleport}}).
* For the stab version, if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, dies, is too far away, or '''Talon''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Noxian Diplomacy'' cancels and refunds its {{sti|cooldown}}. No damage is dealt in any of these cases.
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{ap|8 to 6}}' as '8/7.5/7/6.5/6' and riot's value '0,0,0,0,0' as '0'

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Dash Physical Damage|{{ap|65 to 165}} {{as|(+ 110% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Stab Physical Damage|{{ap|65*1.5 to 165*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110*1.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Dash Physical Damage: (+ 110% bonus AD)
  • Stab Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

w1.name: Rake
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' sends out a volley of daggers in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies they pass through.
The daggers then linger for {{fd|0.75}} seconds before flying back to '''Talon''', dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies they pass through and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second.
''The traveling and returning pass each cannot affect the same enemy more than once.''
leveling:
{{st|Return Physical Damage|{{ap|45 to 125}} {{as|(+ 70% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|45+45to 105+125}} {{as|(+ 110% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
w1.notes:
* If '''Talon''' dies while ''Rake'' is mid-air, the projectiles will still complete their travel.
* ''Rake'' will cast from wherever '''Talon''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.levelingtext:
{{st|Return Physical Damage|{{ap|45 to 125}} {{as|(+ 70% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|45+45to 105+125}} {{as|(+ 110% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
effects.str:
• Return Physical Damage: (+ 70% bonus AD)
  • Total Physical Damage: (+ 110% bonus AD)

  • Slow: %

e1.name: Assassin's Path
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' {{tip|dashes}} a maximum of 800 units over the target structure or piece of terrain, with the dash's speed based on his own {{sti|ms|{{as|movement speed}}}}.
'''Talon''' cannot cast ''Assassin's Path'' on the same area of terrain for a set duration.
e1.notes: * ''Assassin's Path'' can be cast on player-made terrain ({{ai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}, {{ai|Weaver's Wall|Taliyah}}).
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '2' as '2' and riot's value '0,0,0,0,0' as '0'

r1.name: Shadow Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' disperses a ring of blades, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit, while gaining {{tip|invisibility}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds. ''Shadow Assault'' can be recast after 1 second.

When '''Talon''' emerges from invisibility, the blades converge to his location, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies they pass through. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or {{ai|Noxian Diplomacy|Talon}} causes the blades to converge to his target instead.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|90 to 180}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|90*2 to 180*2}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|40 to 70}}%}}
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single pass.
* ''Shadow Assault'' does not cancel '''Talon's''' basic attacks.
